42281.summary: Some customers in View Royal are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
42281.title: Sept 25 – View Royal | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
